titles: A reply to The absolution of a penitent, according to the directions of the Church of England, &c.
author: Collier, Jeremy, 1650-1726.
notes: Dated & signed at end:  May the 20th. 1696, J.C.
"J.C." identified as Jeremy Collier.  Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
